system.description:
• Charismatic (+2): Kalashtar have the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-edges.Item.3jFwJEuUKJJ7YLgz]{Charismatic Edge}. Through their strong presence and psychic subtleties, they are adept at influencing others.

  • Dreamless (+0): Kalashtar can sleep, but they do not dream, rendering them immune to the nightmares power (see Horror Companion), but also unable to travel to Dal Quor during their sleep.

  • Dual Mind (+2): Because of the guidance from the quori spirit with which they are bonded, Kalashtar can reroll opposed @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.bkrB9AajSCSA6eIY]{Psionics} rolls.

  • Enemy (Major) (−2): Kalashtar are constantly hunted by the Dreaming Dark and the Inspired of Reidra.

  • Naturally Psionic (+3): Kalashtar have the Arcane Background (Psion or Soulknife) Edge with @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.iwfXTfzMqC1gWWtw]{mind link} as one of their starting powers. They also have @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.bkrB9AajSCSA6eIY]{Psionics} as a core skill.

  • Outsider (−1): If identified as kalashtar, they subtract 1 from their @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} roll as they seem to have alien dispositions with which most do not feel comfortable.
